title: $1500 Off Move IN!! Renovated Units!! Move In Today!!
posting_body: ['Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', '-Onsite playground', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Professional onsite management', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
